= Requirements =
  * This guide assumes you have gotten the basic SNEEK compiled based on the StartupGuide.
[http://det1re.de/a/sneek/sneek_div.png]
= Introduction =

A quick guide on how to build the di module.
[http://det1re.de/a/sneek/sneek_div.png]

= Compiling =
  * Compiling works the same way as the StartupGuide
  * You need to enable *#USBHAX* in es/ES.c by removing the comment from it 
  * finally use the SNEEK-DI.cmd to build.
  * It is also recommended you take a look at the di/main.c to change the default game and region.

[http://det1re.de/a/sneek/sneek_div.png]

= di.bin creation =
Note: build_boot2_di.cmd does this all for you now.

*1.* Copy the *00000001.app* from the same folder you downloaded using [http://wiibrew.org/wiki/NUS_Downloader NUSD] from the original guide to the SNEEK folder.

*2.* open a command prompt window and run elfins di/iosmodule.elf 00000001.app di.bin
